title: A few questions about Ezreal
body:
As an {{champion:81}} main, I would like to know 3 things about him lore-wise if the answer exists. If FauxSchizzle himself comments, I will be forever happy.

1. What is Ezreal's last name? This is something that has just been bugging me for a while

2. Can he use magic without the gauntlet like the old lore, or is that no longer a thing

3. What are the little triangles under his eyes? Another thing that has been driving me crazy.

{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

replies.body:
1. Not sure we've released this yet. I'll look into it, but no promises on a fast turnaround, holidays slow everything down. 

2. He CAN use magic without his gauntlet, however he prefers not to do so. The Gauntlet makes magic easier, faster, and more powerful. ie -- it's a shortcut and Ez loves using shortcuts. One day he'll have to ditch the gauntlet crutch and do the work the hard way. 

3. I cannot go into detail about the what/why/how yet, but they are expressions of magic that appear when he's channeling or using arcane abilities.

I do have a question about the relationship between ezreals magic and the gauntlet. Without that gauntlet, ezreal can still teleport or fire blasts the same way, but it's more difficult, slower, weaker? Or does the gauntlet also give you unique powers if you can fuel it, like the teleporting?

Oh yeah and I wanted to say while ezreal was already overall my favorite adc, his update has made me spam him nearly every game. The experience is just so much better thanks to his new animations, dance spam, and way more enjoyable vo. So, good job :)

This is actually a fascinating little tidbit.  The gauntlet is probably the most iconic thing about him, so that it may be a hinderance one day (instead of an expedience) is really interesting.
Also, are there any other *actual* mages in Piltover?  Orianna, Viktor, etc. are(seem to be) using hextech (or other technology), not innate magical prowess.  Piltover doesn't have much representation in this regard.
